name: Overwhelming Blink
description: A horrifying dagger forged in the chaos maw and nigh untouchable by mortal hands.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Blink
abilities.description: Instantly teleports the wielder towards the targeted point. After the teleportation, creates a huge shockwave that instantly deals damage to nearby enemies, based on the caster's strength, plus a base amount. Enemies also have their movement and attack speed slowed, and take additional damage over time based on the caster's strength.
notes: Taking more than 0 damage from any other player or Roshan puts the item on a fixed cooldown
Cannot be reset with cooldown reset sources
Shares cooldown with other blink items
Utilizes teleport mechanic - disjoints incoming projectiles
When targeting beyond 1200 distance, teleports 1200 distance towards the targeted point
Doubletap targets a point in front of the team's Fountain
The shockwave is instant despite visual effect
Debuff deals 16.67% of caster's Strength as damage in 1-second intervals
Shockwave first applies debuff, then impact damage

additionalInfo: Purchasable at Base Shop under Armaments, but can only be completed with items from Secret Shop
The item's attributes grant additional health, health regeneration, and attack damage based on hero type
